Message.Title: Strong Dollar
Message.Msg: The strong dollar is having a negative affect on the KO EPS. Where have we heard this before?

Message.Title: WOW! AWESOME ROMNEY WOULD NOT TAX CAPITAL GAINS AND INVESTMENT INCOME
Message.Msg: Romney in the last debate revealed he would eliminate tax on interest, dividends, and capital gains. What a tax savings for investors. Romneyâ€™s plan would let households earning less than $200,000 a year collect capital gains, dividends and interest tax-free. That would encourage more Americans to build cash nest eggs and to own stocks and bonds above and beyond their retirement plans.

Topic.Title: WOW! AWESOME ROMNEY WOULD NOT TAX CAPITAL GAINS AND INVESTMENT INCOME

Message.Msg: I believe that was what clinched the victory and lead in the polls for Romney! Never in the history by the middle of October with an challenger with a plus 50 which Romney now actually leads by seven points has the incumbent won. Guess the Prez will enjoy alot of rounds of golf in Hawaii though and who knows what ghost writer will pen his autobiography. Dinesh DeSousa perhaps? LOL!

Message.Title: just got the earnings pump - cash it in while you can
Message.Msg: otherwise by Wednesday it's not going to be a pretty market place
